name: SubConscious (Andrew Atianyi)
description:
This is submission to the DeepWell DTX + Global Game Jam Mental health jam

Depression is one of the most common mental health issues and is easily triggered by  unplanned events or normal day to day occurrences. This game tries to create awareness as we dive into the subconscious of a person unknowingly suffering from symptoms of depression as he tries to recover his sanity . It is both eye catchy with bright fluid and colorful visuals along with a calming soundtrack to relax players as they play the game. It is therapeutically challenging as it gives players a task to accomplish while tackling obstacles like enemies, riddles etc. That give satisfying visual feedback once there overcome. The overall experience is help motivate the player to tackle life's issues as they come and to keep going strong

CONTROLS

Movement: Arrow keys or W,A,S,D

Mouse Left Button: Shoot blue ray

Mouse Right Button: Project green shield

Space: Float up

Alt: Descend

Upgrade

Mouse left + right button: Shoot green ray

INTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

1.Download file

2.Extract 

3.Click the .exe file and enjoy
